title: Norman the Snowman: Kita no Kuni no Aurora
synopsis: As the first snow falls on a town in the northern country, a boy sneaks out of his house to board a northbound train with his friend “Norman the Snowman.” They are off to witness the beautiful wonders of nature that Norman had always talked about.
related_anime: ['Norman the Snowman: Nagareboshi no Furu Yoru ni']
